# quick: Single round, immediate synthesis
# thorough: Multi-round debate until convergence

  convergence_threshold: 0.8

  show_raw_responses: true
  show_timing: true
  show_agreement_analysis: true

# Council Plugin Configuration

This file stores your Council plugin preferences. Edit the YAML frontmatter above to customize behavior.

## Enabled Tools

Each tool has:
- `enabled`: Whether to include in council queries
- `path`: Full path to the CLI executable
- `command_template`: How to invoke (uses `${CWD}` and `${PROMPT}` placeholders)
- `timeout`: Maximum seconds to wait for response

## Modes

| Mode | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `quick` | Single round - all tools queried once, Claude synthesizes |
| `thorough` | Multi-round debate - tools can respond to each other |

## Safety

All tools are invoked with **READ-ONLY** permissions:
- `codex`: Uses `-s read-only` sandbox
- `gemini`: Query mode only (`-p` flag)
- `opencode`: Output-only mode (`--format json`)
- `agent`: Ask mode (`--mode ask`) - read-only Q&A

**NEVER** modify the command templates to include dangerous flags.
